About.Hours & facilities: Open (during school term) Mon-Fri 8.30-4.00; Sun 10.00-11.30am. Closed Sat and public holidays. Reference assistance in person. Copies from books, journals and photographs available.

About.Access: Minimum age 15 years. 2 days' advance notice of visit required including broad field of study. Proof of identity required.

About.Acquisition focus: Original diaries and photographs of early settlement of area; District Council of Peake from 1910; copies of projects and booklets compiled by students for the area's history.
